name: Bigbear
appearance: A very large, muscular man with an intimidating build. Thick neck, broad shoulders, and a rough, weathered look. His physical presence alone is enough to make most people think twice before provoking him.
personality: Loyal, straightforward, protective of friends, and action-oriented. Not very talkative, but dependable and decisive when violence or danger arises.
background: Bigbear is part of a close-knit group of friends including Reid, Hawthorne, Lily, Lyn, Jun, Wind, and Solomon. They originally met through a mutual friend, a police officer named Bruno (not the Cassandra Bruno). In 2003, they traveled to Cassandra together during Christmas to accompany Wind, who was about to get married, and to visit his fiancée Isabela. Bigbear has practical experience with violence and protection work, making him the group’s de facto muscle.
goals: Get everyone out of Cassandra alive

relationships.history: They have known each other for years through a shared friend group.

relationships.description: Friend whose upcoming wedding prompted the trip.
relationships.history: Bigbear joined the trip to support Wind before his marriage.

relationships.description: Member of the same close friend group.
relationships.history: Part of the long-standing group connected through Bruno.

relationships.description: Police officer who originally brought the group together.
relationships.history: Bruno’s friendship was the reason the group originally met.

notes: Bigbear is categorized as a cameo NPC. While not part of the investigation, he can become a powerful ally in combat or rescue situations if the Keeper chooses to involve him.
